formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_Email
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_CustomerData_Email} == FALSE, "Please input the data in the correct format", "")

formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_IDNumber
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_CustomerData_IDNumber} == FALSE, "Please input the data in the correct format", "")

formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_MotherMaidenName
formulas.expression: IF(LEN({!editor_CustomerData_Mother_Maiden_Name}) < 3, "Please enter at least 3 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_CustomerData_MotherMaidenName}), "Special characters are not allowed, e.g., / \\ : * ? \" < > |", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_Name
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_CustomerData_Name} == FALSE, "Special characters are not allowed, e.g., / \\ : * ? \" < > |", "")

formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_Phone1
formulas.expression: IF(AND(NOT(REGEX({!editor_CustomerData_Mobile_Phone_1}, "^[0-9]+$")), LEN({!editor_CustomerData_Mobile_Phone_1}) < 6), "Please enter at least 6 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_CustomerData_Phone1}), "Please input correct phone number", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_Phone2
formulas.expression: IF(AND(NOT(REGEX({!editor_CustomerData_Mobile_Phone_2}, "^[0-9]+$")), LEN({!editor_CustomerData_Mobile_Phone_2}) < 6), "Please enter at least 6 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_CustomerData_Phone2}), "Please input correct phone number", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_CustomerData_PlaceOfBirth
formulas.expression: IF(LEN({!editor_CustomerData_Place_of_Birth}) < 3, "Please enter at least 3 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_CustomerData_PlaceOfBirth}), "Special characters are not allowed, e.g., / \\ : * ? \" < > |", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_MaritalInformation_IDNumber
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_MaritalInformation_IDNumber} == FALSE, "Please input the data in the correct format", "")

formulas.name: errorText_MaritalInformation_Phone1
formulas.expression: IF(AND(NOT(REGEX({!editor_MaritalInformation_MobilePhone1}, "^[0-9]+$")), LEN({!editor_MaritalInformation_MobilePhone1}) < 6), "Please enter at least 6 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_MaritalInformation_Phone1}), "Please input correct phone number", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_MaritalInformation_Phone2
formulas.expression: IF(AND(NOT(REGEX({!editor_MaritalInformation_MobilePhone2}, "^[0-9]+$")), LEN({!editor_MaritalInformation_MobilePhone2}) < 6), "Please enter at least 6 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_CustomerData_Phone1}), "Please input correct phone number", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_MaritalInformation_PlaceOfBirth
formulas.expression: IF(LEN({!editor_MaritalInformation_PlaceofBirth}) < 3, "Please enter at least 3 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_MaritalInformation_PlaceOfBirth}), "Special characters are not allowed, e.g., / \\ : * ? \" < > |", "" ) )

formulas.name: errorText_MaritalInformation_SpouseName
formulas.expression: IF(LEN({!editor_MaritalInformation_Name}) < 3, "Please enter at least 3 characters", IF(NOT({!validate_MaritalInformation_SpouseName}), "Special characters are not allowed, e.g., / \\ : * ? \" < > |", "" ) )

formulas.name: GetJobMapLatitude
GetJobMapLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!Job_Map_URL.value}, FIND('@', {!Job_Map_URL.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

formulas.name: GetSpouseJobMapLatitude
GetSpouseJobMapLongitude
formulas.expression: IF( AND( FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}) > 0, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) > 0, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) + 1) > 0 ), IF( ISNUMBER( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), VALUE( TRIM( SUBSTITUTE( MID( {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) + 1, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) + 1) - FIND(',', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value}, FIND('@', {!editor_MaritalInformation_Job_Maps.value})) - 1 ), " ", "" ) ) ), 0 ), 0 )

textTemplates.name: test
textTemplates.text: IF(LEN({!editor_CustomerData_Place_of_Birth}) < 3, "Please enter at least 3 character", "") IF({!validate_CustomerData_PlaceOfBirth} == FALSE, "Please input the data in the correct format", "")

textTemplates.name: tpl_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!Economy_Sector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!func_GetIndustryGroup}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_JobCityKabupaten
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!CustomerPersonalJob_Job_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_JobKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_GetJobCityKabupaten}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_JobKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_GetJob_Kecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_JobZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_GetJobKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaritalInformation_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!editor_MaritalInformation_EconomySector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaritalInformation_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!func_MaritalInformation_GetIndustryGroup}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaritalInformation_JobCityKabupaten
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_MaritalInformation_JobProvince.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaritalInformation_JobKecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_MaritalInformation_GetJobCityKabupaten}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaritalInformation_JobKelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_MaritalInformation_GetJobKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MaritalInformation_JobZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_MaritalInformation_GetJobKelurahan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_OtherBusiness_IndustryGroup
textTemplates.text: Select attributes_industry_group_description__c, count(parent_id_formula__c) from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where parent_id_formula__c = '{!editor_OtherBusiness_EconomySector.selectedChoiceValues}' group by attributes_industry_group_description__c

textTemplates.name: tpl_OtherBusiness_IndustryType
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, name__c from API_Industry_Group_and_Type__c where attributes_industry_group_description__c = '{!func_OtherBusiness_GetIndustryGroup}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_ProductOffering
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, text_package_id__c from Product_Offering__c where Product_Type__c = '{!LeadsHeader_Product_Type}'
